import React from 'react' import './Header.styles.scss' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../assets/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../firebase/firebase.utils' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import CartIcon from './CartIcon' import CartDropdown from './CartDropdown' const Header =({currentUser,hidden}) =>{ return(
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
{ }
) } //state is root reducer const mapStateToProps = ({user:{currentUser},cart:{hidden}}) =>({ currentUser, hidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
